pages.title: Hardcore Player Revival
pages.text: The world seems to be far more kind to yourself than anything else around you. When you blacked out after too much damage, you always woke up healthy and fit again, as if you had been given new life.$(br)In exceptional situations however, you cannot cheat death.$(br)Alas! You've got something figured out now, should things ever get tough.

pages.title: Spirit Inst. Recipe
pages.text: To revive a player that died in $(thing)Hardcore$(), you will need $(item)their personal Player Head$(), a hefty sum of resources and a bit of time.
